title: Waifu thread of the day. Waifu Showdown Edition.
body:
[](http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/175/3/d/no_waifu_no_laifu_by_imtheonenexttome-d7nsx3b.gif)Heretic Mods who don't believe in the way of the waifu banned me yesterday so I couldn't create my so beloved Waifu thread of the day.

So, today I bring you the Waifu thread of the day, Showdown edition.

From one side, we have.

http://i.imgur.com/ko5hMFa.jpg[/img]

#Shiina Mayuri.

From the other, we have.

http://i.imgur.com/tpTKYy9.jpg[/img]

#Shiina Mashiro.

---

#Both share the name Shiina.

---


#Both seem to have a severe case of autism, although one at least knows how to paint.

---

#One of them dresses like an Old lady despite being like, 16 or some shit. The other doesn't know why she must dress at all but still dresses because the main character forces her too. Infact, she doesn't know how to do shit, other than painting ofc.

---

#One has a very VERY strong catchfrase. The other doesn't seem to talk much in the first place.

---

#**2 SHIINAS. 1 SURVIVOR.**

---

#**VOTE NOW**

---

PS: I feel like this is the stupidest fucking thing I've ever posted on GD, but I'm probably wrong anyway so I don't give a shit.
